title: Jennifer Westacott - Wikipedia
snippet: Jennifer Westacott AC is an Australian business executive. She served as the chief executive of the Business Council of Australia (BCA) from 2011 to 2023. She is the current chancellor of Western Sydney University. She grew up in Springfield in New South Wales, Australia and completed her secondary ...

title: Jennifer Anne Westacott - Biography
snippet: Jennifer Anne Westacott currently works at Future Generation Global Ltd., as Chairman from 2023, Studio Schools of Australia Ltd., as Chairman from 2019, Western Parkland City Authority, as Chairman from 2019, Wesfarmers Ltd., as Independent Non-Executive Director from 2013, The Pinnacle Foundation, as Director, Cyber Security Research Centre Ltd., as Director from 2018, ATCO Gas Australia Pty Ltd., as Director from 2024, ATCO Australia Pty Ltd., as Director from 2024, Canadian Utilities Ltd., as Independent Director from 2025, The University of New South Wales, as Member from 2019, the University of Western Sydney, as Chancellor from 2023, and Reserve Bank of Australia, as Member-Governors Board.

title: Jennifer Westacott AC
snippet: Jennifer was Chief Executive of the Business Council of Australia, the leading forum for the heads of over 100 of Australia's top companies to contribute to public policy debate, from February 2011 until October 2023. Prior to that, she was a board director and lead partner at KPMG, heading ...

title: The boss of the Business Council defies the stereotype of the blue-blooded big shot
snippet: Jennifer Westacott dreaded two things growing up: the school bus and Sundays. A self-confessed nerd who preferred history books to gossiping about boys, she was a target for the school bullies on her way home every day.
